artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Mill: Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Twill weave, vertical and horizontal stripes in different colors that emphasize the twill pattern. 3 orange warp. Yellow, tan & metallic bronze weft. Twill. Machine edged all 4 sides. Stapled to 8.5x11" card with 99.1.1200.3. "H8-A" and a lengthy weaving description also stapled to card (orange, yellow, tan, bronze metallic beige)
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc. %2F Pomegranate%2C Jack Larsen%2C 1953
title: Pomegranate
